user_query: I want to find a good school for my children in San Jose, California. Can you provide me with a list of elementary schools in the area along with their ratings and reviews? Additionally, fetch me a motivational quote to inspire my children.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of elementary schools in San Jose, California.
Retrieve ratings and reviews for each elementary school obtained in step 1.
Fetch a motivational quote to inspire children.
